Name: Clear the herb garden
Description: Defeat the snakes in the Herbalist's garden

Name: Clear the Farmer's' Field
Description: Defeat the rats in the Farmer's Field

Name: Pay a visit to the nerd at the Gate
Description: The Shrieking Geek at Town's Gate wants to have a little chat with you.

Name: Save the village from the Dungeons of Doom
Description: The nerd asks you to save this village from the horrible creatures beneth. Oh, and he asks you to clean his underwear too..
